struct  UsbCanModel
 

Functions

static void usb_can_draw_callback (Canvas *canvas, void *_model)
 This function displays bytes transmitted and received when application is in operating mode (user selected an item from the menu). It is registered in usb_can_view_alloc().
 
static bool usb_can_input_callback (InputEvent *event, void *context)
 This callback registered in usb_can_view_alloc() and trigged by furi gui component is used to go to SCENE-CONFIG if left arrow key is pressed via usb_can_view_update_state().
 
usbCanView * usb_can_view_alloc ()
 This function allocate view usbCanView::view element and register usb_can_draw_callback and usb_can_input_callback callbacks to furi gui component.
 
void usb_can_view_free (usbCanView *usb_can_view)
 This function free memory allocated for VIEW component functionning in usb_can_view_alloc.

 
View * usb_can_get_view (usbCanView *usb_can_view)
 get View object reference holded by usbCanView object (which correspond to data used by VIEW component) passed in parameter.
 
void usb_can_view_set_callback (usbCanView *usb_can, usbCanViewCallBack_t callback, void *context)
 register callback to VIEW component (see usbCanView::callback). This will be used to forward callbacks registered in usb_can_view_alloc() to SCENE-USB-CAN component.
 
void usb_can_view_update_state (usbCanView *instance, UsbCanConfig *cfg, UsbCanStatus *st)
 function called by usb_can_scene_usb_can_on_event() periodically to update data display (data updated to correspond to those holded by MODEL component)
